home.title: Horchata Labs
home.intro:
Horchata Labs is a premium boutique creative-tech agency based in Valencia, Spain, specialized in digital positioning, branding, and technical SEO for brands that demand quality.

We ship Next.js + TypeScript websites and funnels with next-intl (i18n), server actions, image optimization, and Lighthouse-clean performance. We wire GA4 + GTM (Consent Mode, CookieYes), implement technical SEO, and run content that actually ranks—so every launch is faster and every decision is data-backed.

We combine AI-assisted research and LLM automation with hands-on strategy to explore new technologies, connect best-in-class tools, and build digital experiences that keep brands ahead of the curve.

contact.prefill: Hi! I’d like to talk about a project with Horchata Labs.
